query.name: ListPathway
query.view: Gene.primaryIdentifier Gene.symbol Gene.name Gene.pathways.genes.primaryIdentifier Gene.pathways.genes.symbol Gene.pathways.genes.name Gene.pathways.name Gene.pathways.identifier Gene.pathways.dataSets.name Gene.pathways.genes.organism.shortName
query.longDescription: For a given Gene A (or List A of Genes) show any associated Pathway(s) in common with Gene B (or List B of Genes). Datasource: KEGG or REACTOME. Keywords: pathways, cascade, metabolism, reaction
